meanings.definition: A person who shares a room or apartment with another.
meanings.sent1: My roomie and I study together every night.
meanings.sent2: I have a great roomie who always cleans up after themselves.
meanings.sent3: My roomie thought the closet was a secret passage to Narnia!
meanings.sent4: Living with my roomie feels like having a built-in friend.
meanings.sent5: My roomie is like a puzzle piece that fits perfectly in my life.

meanings.sent1: Hey roomie, do you want to grab dinner together?
meanings.sent2: My roomie is always up for watching movies on weekends.
meanings.sent3: My roomie and I have a secret handshake just for fun.
meanings.sent4: Being roomies with my best friend is a dream come true.
meanings.sent5: I consider my roomie as family because we share everything.
